caption: The FBI raided the CDC in the middle of the night to seize data on a link between vaccines and autism.

result.explanation: The image shows the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) building.  The caption mentions an FBI raid, which is not depicted in the image. While the image shows the CDC, it does not show any FBI activity. Therefore, the entities "FBI" and the action of "raiding" are not visually present, though the CDC is.

candidates.title: Did the FBI Raid the CDC for Data on Vaccines and Autism?
candidates.content:
This morning President Trump ordered the CDC Headquarters in Atlanta to be raided at 3:00 Am Their Time.
Although Unconfirmed the CDC did tell me on the phone a few minutes ago: "We Are Not Allowed To Comment On That.Please Email me and we will give you a statement about it. "
I also had 36 Posts on my video 10 minutes before it was posted...
Long before the Employees began showing up to work the FBI was busting down doors and seizing computers.
Accompanying these FBI Agents was Dr William Thompson  who is a CDC Whistle Blower.
The raid was ordered by the President and was led by Sally Yates - Acting Attorney General and part of the King and Spalding Law Group, which was also working with President Trumps huge law firm: Jones Day.
All of the records for the Vaccines - what is in them, what they have done to people across the globe - it is all being seized as you read this.
As soon as President Obama took office he granted both the CDC and Monsanto protection in their massive use of GMO Foods and Vaccines to kill people world wide. That protection is now gone. The employees involved in murder and disabling people world wide have two choices: Become a whistle blower or face 20 years to life in prison.
There is no place you can hide on this planet or in this planet.
So what is in Vaccines that make them so deadly???
Of the 202 children we have worked with 2 were autistic due to Vaccines given to the Mothers while she was in the military. The other 200 became autistic the day they were vaccinated and all have Indigo Aura ... Those with Chrystaline Auras were killed outright. This author has a Chrystaline Aura.
candidates.description: A known hoax purveyor spread false claims the FBI "raided" the CDC in the middle of the night for data on vaccines and autism on the order of President Trump.

result.explanation: The news caption is False.  Source 1 explicitly identifies the claim as a hoax.  While the source describes the alleged events, it does so within the context of debunking them.  The content explicitly states that the claim is false.
result.supporting_points: Source 1:  Title: Did the FBI Raid the CDC for Data on Vaccines and Autism? Description: A known hoax purveyor spread false claims the FBI "raided" the CDC in the middle of the night for data on vaccines and autism on the order of President Trump.

final_result.explanation:
The caption claims that the FBI raided the CDC to seize data on a link between vaccines and autism.  Both internal and external validation checks strongly refute this claim.

Internal Validation:
The internal check analyzes the image itself. The image depicts the CDC building, but there is no visual evidence of an FBI raid or any activity suggesting such an event.  The absence of any indication of a raid, coupled with the presence of the CDC building, creates a strong internal inconsistency. The confidence score of 8 reflects this high degree of internal inconsistency.

External Validation:
The external validation leverages external sources to verify the claim. The external check explicitly identifies the claim as a hoax, citing a source that debunks the claim's veracity. The source directly refutes the narrative presented in the caption.  The high confidence score of 10 highlights the strong evidence from this external source, which firmly establishes the falsity of the claim. 

Discrepancy Analysis:
There is no significant discrepancy between the internal and external checks. Both independently and strongly suggest that the caption is inaccurate and out of context.  Both assessments point towards the caption being false. The high confidence scores from both (8 and 10) reinforce this conclusion.

Entity Analysis:
The entities mentioned in the caption are: "FBI", "CDC", "vaccines", and "autism". The image contains only the CDC building. The caption mentions the FBI's involvement in an action (raid) and the existence of data linking vaccines to autism. None of these elements are present in the image. The lack of visual evidence internally and the explicit external debunking of the claim strongly support the conclusion that the caption is out of context.

Conclusion:
Based on both the internal and external validation results, which show a strong and consistent agreement that the claim is false, and because the image does not support the caption's narrative, the final conclusion is that the caption is out of context. The combined confidence score reflects the strong evidence supporting this conclusion.
final_result.validation_summary: Both internal and external validation checks strongly indicate that the caption is false and out of context. The image lacks any evidence of an FBI raid, and external sources explicitly label the claim as a hoax.
